Merge pull request #23 from tchar/attributes-support

Attributes support etc.
Minor changes: code polishing in SegmentedGroup:LayoutSelector.
Some minor changes: method renaming, variables initialization.

Added support for attribute corner_radius and border_width. Now user can select from the layout those attributes. Since setting corner radius is done programmatically via accessing attrs, there is no need for multiple xml drawables for each left/top, middle, right/bottom radiobuttons.
Polished the code in updateBackground. Added a Layout Selector to provide the proper layout
Added support for custom border radius and border width/height
